dataList.dlg:
Aah... Could it... You're...
My Sinclair...?

All my fault, you say...? What fault?
I daresay it's all thanks to me.

dataList.desc: 말풍선 특수 대사_에드가 가문 치프 버틀러 료슈
dataList.dlg:
S.A.D.
You're a failure of a Chief Butler.
Quite the pathetic reception!

... I'll gouge out your
contemptuous eyes.

Do you still fail to understand?
That you... are nothing but prey!

A soaking wet mutt, are you now?
Oh, does this not remind you of
the day I took your place?! HAHAHAHA!

Hmph, how dare you glorified
dishwashers bare your knives at me?

Catherine...?! It's me, Heathcliff...!
Please, embrace me once again!!!

It matters not what kind of Heathcliff you are!
I shall embrace every Catherine mine!!!

... You gave up your dream for the Family? 
You, who preached about your
dream with every breath...?
No... she is not like my sister.

You dare raise your blade against a higher Kindred? 
Punishment for your filial impiety awaits. 
... And for me as well, I suppose...

Those wounds... the Priest of this world
must be just as haunted by guilt.

I expect you to fight to your deaths in this
crucial struggle, reversible as they may be.
Unearth it.
It must lie there still, shrouded it may be.
Shall it remain buried still?
Demonstrate to me your will.
The mass of pain within your heart... is difficult to untangle.

Is it your companions who hold your tongue?
Then... perhaps they must be shaken afore
you are to speak your truth.
Do not fear the futility. There will be time for that once you have spoken your mind.
Rest awhile... until the clock turns.
Cut them Down, Mao.
Heed Me, Zilu.

Huh... y'all ain't half bad!
Keep makin' it worth my bullet fees!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡사용 시: 탄환 충분 - 강력한 스킬
dataList.dlg:
Eyes up here, boys!
Don'tcha go losin' yer heads now!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡사용 시: 탄환 부족 - 강력한 스킬
dataList.dlg: Hwell, what's this? Manageable so far?

I'maboutta drop somethin' big on y'all!
Don't let it kill y'all now and spoil the fun!

Aw heck, don't tell me
y'all are tuckered out already!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡턴 시작 : [체력 n% 이하]에 버프 획득
dataList.dlg:
That's more like it.
Y'all are firin' me up!

Y'all don't go on huntin' tigers without preparin'
yerselves to get chomped 'tween one of them jaws!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡턴 시작 : [체력 n% 이하]에 버프 변경
dataList.dlg:
Can't leave a dance unfinished.
Ain't that right?

Can't waste any more time on these...
... sickening, revolting insects.

Don’t pretend you’ve changed.
You’re still the same trash you were back then... scum!
... Is this also the E.G.O's power?

Behold! This contempt!
It rains down upon the disgusting filth!
Foolishness.

You have taken a glimpse of yesterday's spring.
A memory rarely availed to even myself.

Do not let your past ties ruin your judgment.
It makes me want to blast them all away.

Sacrifices are necessary
in pursuit of the greater cause.

dataList.desc: 구보체력 n% 미만 / 경멸 나선 모드 감상
dataList.dlg: ... Whew. That worked.
Fulfill your worth!
You dare!

Oh, revered Xianren! Shi Miyin brought the gem back!
The pretty gem that'll make Hongyuan all beautiful again…!

Blasphemous transgressors!
Outsiders shall not covet the treasure of Daguanyuan!

You favor me, don't you?
I knew you would, dear Xianhuang Worm!

All the wisdom of Hongyuan...
Give it to me, give it to Miyin...!
Be one with the fathomless history of Hongyuan!

dataList.desc: 가모턴 시작 : 지고한 불사 흐트러짐 실패
dataList.dlg:
We have transcended the yoke of life and death...
Thus, Hongyuan shall shine for all eternity as well!
Ahh... What a shameful failure of duties this is...
You will obey us!
